sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.agentStartingMessage: The AI agent is starting up. This may take up to 2 minutes. Please wait...
sessions.createSessionToStart: Create a new session to start chatting with AI agents
sessions.ultrathinkInstruction: Include 'ultrathink' in your message to grant maximum thinking budget
sessions.shareSessionDescription: Post this text to Slack with an app mention to send messages to the session and receive notifications.

home.title: Welcome to Remote SWE Agents
home.description: Remote SWE Agents allows you to collaborate with AI-powered software engineers to help with your projects.

cost.title: Cost Analysis
cost.description: Analyze the usage costs and token consumption of AI agents
cost.costBreakdownDescription: Detailed cost breakdown by session and model

new_session.title: New Session
new_session.heading: Start a New Conversation with AI Agent
new_session.description: Creating a new session will launch a dedicated worker and enable real-time conversation with AI agents.
new_session.placeholder: Enter your initial message to the AI agent (e.g., 'Help me create a React component' or 'Review my code for bugs')...

templateModal.title: Prompt Templates
templateModal.noTemplates: No templates found. Create your first template!
templateModal.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this template?

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Configure your application preferences and settings

global.title: Global Preferences
global.description: Configure global application settings and preferences

prompt.title: Agent Prompt Configuration
prompt.description: This prompt will be added to all agents' system prompt. Use this to set organization-wide guidelines or instructions.
prompt.saveSuccess: Common prompt has been successfully saved

api_settings.title: API Keys
api_settings.description: Manage API keys for programmatic access
api_settings.createDesc: API keys are used to authenticate HTTP API requests. They should be kept secret.
api_settings.yourKeysDesc: These are the API keys associated with your account.
api_settings.noKeys: No API keys found. Create one to get started.
api_settings.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this API key (optional)
api_settings.newKeyCreated: New API key created - Save this key now, you won't be able to see it again!
api_settings.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this API key and revoke access for any services using it.

documentation.title: API Documentation
documentation.desc: How to use the Remote SWE Agents API
documentation.authDesc: All API requests require authentication using an API key. Include your API key in the Authorization header:
documentation.createSessionDesc: Create a new agent session with an initial message:
documentation.createSessionReturns: Returns a workerId that can be used to send additional messages:
documentation.sendMessageDesc: Send a follow-up message to an existing session:
documentation.sendMessageNote: Replace :sessionId with the workerId returned when creating the session.
documentation.getSessionDesc: Retrieve detailed information about a session including status, cost, and messages:

customAgent.title: Custom Agents
customAgent.description: Create and manage custom AI agents with specific behaviors and capabilities

create.title: Create Custom Agent
create.description: Define a custom AI agent with specific system prompts, tools, and configurations

name.label: Agent Name
name.placeholder: Enter agent name (e.g., Code Reviewer, Bug Hunter)
name.description: A descriptive name for your custom agent

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Enter agent description (e.g., Agent specialized in code review and bug detection)
description.description: Description of this agent's purpose and capabilities

defaultModel.label: Default Model
defaultModel.description: The AI model this agent will use by default

systemPrompt.label: System Prompt
systemPrompt.placeholder: You are a helpful assistant specialized in...
systemPrompt.description: Define the agent's behavior, expertise, and response style

tools.label: Tools
tools.description: Select tools from the available options that the agent can use

mcpConfig.label: MCP Configuration
mcpConfig.description: Optional MCP (Model Context Protocol) configuration for advanced integrations

runtimeType.label: Runtime Type
runtimeType.description: The runtime environment where the agent will operate
